Headline: #8A South Halsted Temporary Reroute at Halsted/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#8A South Halsted buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Halsted, Vincennes, 83rd and Halsted due to, street blockage near Halsted/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow Line has been temporarily suspended due to a medical emergency on the tracks.

#97 Skokie and shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.
